title: How to Assign a Photo to a Contact on Your Android Phone

steps.title: Search and select the contact for whom you want to assign a photo.
steps.content: Search and select the contact for whom you want to assign a photo.

steps.title: Edit the contact.
steps.content: Edit the contact. Tap on the empty area present above the contact details, or just select "Edit Contact."

steps.title: Select either "Take photo" or "Choose photo from Gallery.
steps.content: Select either "Take photo" or "Choose photo from Gallery. " This option depends on your choice. Yes, it is that simple! You can now assign photos to your other contacts by following the same method.
